name: There Can Only Be One
description:
It's a small world.

Clones of you are running rampant around the city, but there can only be one.

- A & D to move left and right

- Click to shoot

----------------------------------------

"There Can Only Be One"

Made in under 72 hours for Ludum Dare #38

----------------------------------------

Software Used:

[All assets created by me unless stated otherwise]

- Game Engine: Unity 5.5

- Artwork: Pyxel Edit, Adobe Photoshop CC 2015

- Sound Effects: BFXR, Audacity

- Music: FL Studio 10

----------------------------------------

Ambient track (rain) from: https://www.soundjay.com/
